project.name: SaaS Go-to-Market Plan
project.description: Complete go-to-market strategy for a B2B SaaS product launch, from persona mapping through acquisition channels to success metrics.

data.title: Go-to-Market Brief
data.body: Launch a B2B SaaS product targeting SMB operations teams. Phase 1 focuses on product-led growth with freemium onboarding, content marketing, and strategic integrations. Target: 500 active accounts within 6 months of launch.

data.name: Operations Lead
data.painPoints: Drowning in spreadsheets and manual reporting. Needs real-time visibility across teams. Current tools are disconnected — Slack, Sheets, Notion, Jira don't talk to each other.

data.name: Team Member
data.painPoints: Too many status update meetings. Wants a simple way to log progress without context-switching. Resistant to adopting yet another tool.

data.name: Live Operations Dashboard
data.description: Real-time cross-team dashboard that aggregates project status, blockers, and KPIs from connected tools into one view.
data.userStory: As an Ops Lead, I want to see all team progress in one dashboard so I can skip the Monday status meeting.

data.name: One-Click Integrations
data.description: Pre-built connectors for Slack, Jira, Linear, Notion, and Google Sheets. Zero-config setup with OAuth.
data.userStory: As a team member, I want my existing tools to sync automatically so I don't have to manually update another system.

data.name: Weekly Digest & Reports
data.description: Auto-generated weekly summaries sent via email/Slack. Highlights blockers, completed milestones, and trending KPIs.
data.userStory: As an Ops Lead, I want an automatic weekly report so I can share progress with leadership without manual work.

data.name: Content & SEO
data.notes: Blog posts targeting 'ops team visibility', 'replace status meetings', 'team dashboard for SMB'. SEO-optimized comparison pages vs spreadsheets.

data.name: Product-Led Growth
data.notes: Freemium tier with 3 integrations. Upgrade triggers: team size > 10, custom reports, API access. In-app upgrade prompts at value moments.

data.name: Integration Partnerships
data.notes: Co-marketing with Slack, Notion, Linear app directories. Joint webinars with complementary tools.

data.name: Monthly Recurring Revenue
data.measurement: Stripe dashboard — sum of active subscriptions. Exclude free tier.

data.name: Activation Rate
data.measurement: % of signups who connect at least 2 integrations within 7 days.

data.name: Net Promoter Score
data.measurement: In-app NPS survey triggered at Day 30. Quarterly email survey for all active users.

data.name: Low Team Adoption
data.mitigation: Build Slack bot that enables updates without leaving Slack. Offer 1:1 onboarding for first 50 accounts. Create 'champion' program for ICs.

data.name: Established Competitors
data.mitigation: Differentiate on simplicity and speed-to-value. Position as 'the dashboard you set up in 5 minutes, not 5 weeks'. Target the SMB gap that enterprise tools ignore.

data.name: Handoff to Development
data.notes: Translate feature priorities and integration requirements into technical architecture and sprint planning.
